section.title: Disable a user's Two Factor Authentication
section.para: If a user has enabled Two Factor Authentication and then loses access to his/her authentication device (e.g. smartphone gets lost or broken), this user will not be able to log into the system anymore. To solve this issue, a user manager can disable Two Factor Authentication for the affected user, so that the user is able to access the system again using just a password.

listitem.para: Open the Users app and click Users.
In the object list, click the menu icon of the relevant user and select Disable Two Factor Authentication.

note.para: The option to disable Two Factor Authentication will only be available for users that have set up Two Factor Authentication via the user-profile-app.
